insert all into join_board (PLAN_ID, USER_ID, TITLE,CONTENT, PERSONNEL ,START_DAY , END_DAY, DESTINATION, PLAN_STATE, FINISH_DATE) values (#{planId}, #{userId} , #{title}, #{content} ,#{personnel} ,TO_DATE(#{startDay}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDay}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,#{destination},#{planType}, TO_DATE(#{finishDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) into join_board_member (plan_id, user_id) values (#{planId}, #{userId})

mapper.select: select a.plan_id, a.user_id, a.title, a.content, a.destination, a.personnel, TO_CHAR(a.start_day, 'YY-MM-DD') as start_day, TO_CHAR(a.end_day, 'YY-MM-DD') as end_day, TO_CHAR(a.reg_date, 'YY-MM-DD') as reg_date, TO_CHAR(a.finish_date, 'YY-MM-DD') as finish_date, a.plan_state, REGEXP_SUBSTR(a.content, '<img[^>]+>', 1, 1) as first_image, b.nick, b.birth, b.gender, b.image_id from JOIN_BOARD a, (select nick, TRUNC((SYSDATE - BIRTH) / 365) as birth, DECODE(gender, 'M', '남자', 'F', '여자') as gender, image_id, user_id from users where status = 0) b where plan_state != 2 and a.user_id = b.user_id order by a.plan_id desc
